replies.body: I'm excited to see [Nexus Siege](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/nexus-siege) is out!  It's a [Rotating Game Mode](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/gameplay/rotating-game-mode-queue-now-live-12), meaning it will be around for a limited time until the next special mode cycles in (looks like Nexus Siege will be back to back weekends).  The [current schedule ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/JzQkg9BJ-rotating-game-mode-queue-update)for Rotating Game Modes for NA starts on Friday afternoon and will end on Monday.  Happy sieging!
Technically it ends early Tuesday morning. :D
It doesn't start in 07/15/18, it goes from 07/15 - 07/18, as in all weekend.
